content: In #14739 I add some @[gcongr] lemmas. The lemma for μ ≤ ν → μ s ≤ ν s makes some proofs about probability kernels fail. Any idea why? Do we have a competing gcongr lemma and they enter a cycle?

It happens if you change one of the TODO lines in the PR with gcongr (drop the pattern).
